summary: This bill, H.R. 4609, seeks to extend the authority of the Defense Production Act of 1950. Specifically, it amends Section 717(a) of the Act (50 U.S.C. 4564(a)) to replace the expiration date of September 30, 2025, with September 30, 2031. The Defense Production Act allows the government to direct industrial production for national security purposes.
